options.text: Air distance is greater than ground distance.
Ground distance and air distance are independent of wind.
Air distance and ground distance are equal.
Ground distance is greater than air distance.

variant.question: What is the relationship between the air distance and the ground distance between two positions on the ground while cruising at FL400 in zero wind conditions?

options.text: The air distance is slightly greater than the ground distance.
The air distance is equal to the ground distance.
The ground distance is slightly greater than the air distance.
The air distance is much greater than the ground distance.
